projectVersion.description: Project version as defined by the customer

name.description: Path to the file with the project directory as base path.

type.description: Type of file. Stylesheet, JavaScript and EsModule are supported.

description.description: A long description of this file.

activeTheme.description: Name of the Theme which is active while loading the Application.

themes.description: List of Themes of this Application.

resources.description: References to Resources of this Theme.

name.description: Path to the file with the project directory as base path.

description.description: A long description of this file.

replacesThemeForControls.description: Project only: Do not load theme files (.theme and .css) for this controls

replacesThemeForPackageComponents.description:
Project only: Do not load .css files for these package components (as 'packageId/componentName'). 
For example 'Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.Controls/ContentTabs' or for all global resources 'Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.ResponsiveNavigation'

startupView.description: Name of the View which is active while loading the Application.

loginPage.description: Path to a custom login page.

websocketIntervalTime.description: Interval used for server request or symbols if no override is specified.

websocketTimeout.description: Timeout used for server requests or symbols if no override is specified.

websocketSystemTimeout.description: Timeout used for internal server communication. Normally it is not necessary to change this setting.

websocketSubscriptionMode.description: Subscription mode used for symbol related subscriptions if no override (for example symbol option) is specified.

basePath.description: Path to the package root directory.

url.description: Path to the Usercontrol main file.

content.description: List of all available content files.

preload.description: Defines if the file should be loaded and compiled during initialization to accelerate later usage.

keepAlive.description: Defines if the compile result should be cached after first usage to accelerate later usage.

loadSync.description: Defines if the content should be loaded synchronous.

preloadBindings.description: Defines if bindings on controls within this file should be preloaded before its content is displayed to have proper values when the content is displayed. Requires Preload to be activated.

views.description: List of all available view files.

preload.description: Defines if the file should be loaded and compiled during initialization to accelerate later usage.

keepAlive.description: Defines if the compile result should be cached after first usage to accelerate later usage.

preloadBindings.description: Defines if bindings on controls within this file should be preloaded before its content is displayed to have proper values when the content is displayed. Requires Preload to be activated.

userFunctions.description: List of all available user function files.

url.description: Path to the user function js file.

symbols.description: Definition of all project based symbols.

internal.description: Definition of all project based internal symbols (available via %i%symbolname%/i%). Key is the symbol name.

additionalProperties.description: Definition of the internal symbol with this name.

persist.description: The change of value is saved in the client and available after reload. Defaults to false if not provided.

readonly.description: The symbol can not be changed. Defaults to false if not provided.

type.description: Information about the expected type as a tchmi reference name.

themedResources.description: Definition of all project based themedResource symbols (available via %tr%symbolname%/tr%). Key is the symbol name.

additionalProperties.description: Definition of the themedResource symbol with this name.

type.description:
Information about the expected type as a tchmi reference name. 
The type of the parameter gives the tchmi creator a hint to use a custom editor.

description.description: A description of the themed resource.

values.description: A map containing a value for each theme. Key is the themename.

timer.description: Definition of all project based timer symbols (available via %t%symbolname%/t%). Key is the symbol name.

additionalProperties.description: Definition of the timer symbol with this name.

pattern.description: Value pattern for this timer symbol.

value.description: Value for this pattern part. Only used when symbol is not defined.

duration.description: Duration in milliseconds for this timer symbol pattern part.

symbol.description: SymbolExpression which represents the value for this timer symbol pattern part. Overrides value when defined.

duration.description: Duration in milliseconds for this timer symbol pattern part.

runSymbol.description: SymbolExpression (Boolean) which controls the state of the timer.

stopValue.description: Value which is active when the timer is stopped.

type.description: Information about the expected type as a tchmi reference name.

intervals.description: Definition of all project based intervals. Key is the interval name.

additionalProperties.description: Definition of the interval with this name.

languages.description: List of all available localization files for the project strings (LocalizedText symbols).

additionalProperties.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path or array of paths.

oneOf.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path.

items.description: List of localization files. If some keys are referenced in multiple files, the last file will win.

languageFallback.description: Definition of Language and Region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US').

languagesForFramework.description: Project level overrides for framework core localization files.

additionalProperties.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path or array of paths.

oneOf.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path.

items.description: List of localization files. If some keys are referenced in multiple files, the last file will win.

languagesForPackages.description: Project level overrides for framework package localization files.

languages.description: List of all available localization files of the related package.

additionalProperties.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path or array of paths.

oneOf.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path.

items.description: List of localization files. If some keys are referenced in multiple files, the last file will win.

languagesForControls.description: Project level overrides for framework control localization files.

languages.description: List of all available localization files of the related control.

additionalProperties.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path or array of paths.

oneOf.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path.

items.description: List of localization files. If some keys are referenced in multiple files, the last file will win.

languagesForFunctions.description: Project level overrides for framework function localization files.

languages.description: List of all available localization files of the related function.

additionalProperties.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path or array of paths.

oneOf.description: Key is the language and region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US'). Value is the file path.

items.description: List of localization files. If some keys are referenced in multiple files, the last file will win.

keyboardLayouts.description: List of available keyboard layouts in project.

domain.description: Name of the TcSpeech extension on the server. Defaults to 'TcHmiSpeech'

confidenceThreshold.description: Ignore detected speech commands with a lower relative measure of the certainty of correct recognition of a phrase. The value is from 0.0 to 1.0, for low to high confidence, respectively.

symbolError.description:
Determines how a binding will handle symbol related read/watch errors.
Possible values:
- Ignore: Ignore the error.
- Reset: Forward the default toggle switch (null) to force the control attribute to reset to default value.

symbolWriteError.description:
Determines how a binding will handle symbol related write errors.
Possible values:
- Ignore: Ignore the error.
- ReadBack: Read back the current symbol value after write attempt failure and forward it to the control.

autoOpen.description: Defines if the system keyboard should open on focus of a textarea or input element.

providerName.description: Name of the keyboard provider or empty string to disable system keyboard.

projectKeyboardMapping.description: Definition of the keyboard mappings. Key is the locale.

additionalProperties.description: Mapping from input mode string to project based keyboard layout. Key is the input mode.

text.description:
Keyboard layout path for texts and unknown input elements. 
Could be the empty string. Will fall back to 'text' of fallback language.

decimal.description:
Keyboard layout path for decimal input elements (potential fractional input). 
Could be the empty string. Will fall back to 'decimal' of fallback language, 
'text' keyboard file of this language or 'text' of fallback language.

numeric.description:
Keyboard layout path for numeric input elements (non-fractional input). 
Could be empty. Will fall back to 'decimal' of this language, 
'numeric' / 'decimal' of fallback language, 
'text' keyboard file of this language or 'text' of fallback language.

additionalProperties.description:
Configured project based keyboard path for some text controls or input controls. 
Could be the empty string. Will fall back to the same input mode of fallback language, 
'text' keyboard file of this language or 'text' of fallback language.

height.description:
Pixel height of the system keyboard. 
If empty the defined height of the keyboard layout will be used.

position.description: Position of the system keyboard. If not defined will use popup.

showThenActions.description: Holds the current state of the Trigger GUI. Not used in runtime
Holds the current state of the Trigger GUI. Not used in runtime
Holds the current state of the Trigger GUI. Not used in runtime

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

waitMode.description: Synchronous: Next step will called after last JavaScript line. Asynchronous: Next step will called after calling ctx.success() or ctx.error(TcHmi.Errors.ERROR)

success.description: Steps which will be called after call of ctx.success() with Asynchronous or last line with Synchronous.

error.description: Steps which will be called after call of ctx.success() with Asynchronous or an exception with Synchronous.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

asyncWait.description: The next step is called after the completion of this step.

description.description: A long description of this control.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

anyOf.title: ControlApiFunction
anyOf.description: Defines an API of the control.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

anyOf.title: Comment
anyOf.description: Free comment. Will be ignored on runtime.

comment.description: Free comment. Will be ignored on runtime.

valueType.description: Information about the used type as a tchmi reference name for re-edit scenarios while Engineering.
Information about the expected type as a tchmi reference name.

controlSymbolExpression.title: controlSymbolExpression
controlSymbolExpression.description: Reference to a Control Symbol Expression

preventDefault.description:
If activated the default action of the event will not be triggered.
If set on touch events the corresponding mouse events will not be triggered.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.
